entertainment.name: Mu Qian Yang Sheng SPA (慕媤养生SPA)
entertainment.location: Jiefangbei, Yuzhong District, Bayi Road 181, basement floor (below Mercure Hotel)
entertainment.notes: High-end spa near Raffles City for post-dinner relaxation. Book in advance. Session duration: 90-120 minutes. Walking distance from hotel.

entertainment.name: KOH Thai Spa (暹罗之屿泰式按摩足疗)
entertainment.location: Jiefangbei, Yuzhong District, Bayi Road 238, Bayi Square F6
entertainment.notes: Alternative to Mu Qian. Thai massage specialty. Near Liberation Monument area. Book in advance for evening slots.

entertainment.name: Café del Volcán
entertainment.notes: Specialty coffee spot with French-inspired exterior. Known for freshly roasted beans and finest coffee in Shanghai. Pairs well with Xuhui area exploration.

entertainment.name: Seesaw Coffee
entertainment.notes: Pioneer of specialty coffee in China. Sources beans from Yunnan. Modern atmosphere suitable for INFJ preferences.

entertainment.name: Single Origin Roasters
entertainment.notes: Specializes in single-origin Ethiopian beans. Self-roasted. Lattes around 27 RMB. Intimate setting.

entertainment.name: TOP TOY (Nanjing East Road Flagship)
entertainment.location: Nanjing East Road Pedestrian Street (3 floors)
entertainment.notes: Popmart alternative with collectible toys, plushies, blind boxes. Features Sanrio, Disney, Line Friends. Has café on 3rd floor. Budget is estimated for purchases.

entertainment.name: Garden Books
entertainment.notes: Widest selection of English-language books in Shanghai. Ground floor has ice-cream parlor/café for browsing. Budget for book purchases.

entertainment.name: Shanghai Foreign Language Bookstore
entertainment.notes: Nine-floor establishment, biggest foreign bookstore. Ground floor has cheap Signet, Collins, Bantam Classics, Penguin Classics, recent releases.

entertainment.name: Café on Air
entertainment.notes: Described as perhaps Shanghai's best coffee shop overall. Beautifully made coffee. Hidden gem atmosphere.

entertainment.name: Dance Drama '只此青绿' (A Panorama of Rivers and Mountains)
entertainment.location: National Centre for the Performing Arts, No. 2 West Chang'an Street, Xicheng District
entertainment.notes: CRITICAL: Must verify February 2026 schedule - not yet confirmed. Typical ticket prices: 180-980 RMB. Book via National Centre official website, WeChat 'guojiadadjuyuanzhihuiguanjia', or hotline 66550000. Book 1-2 months in advance. Performance duration ~90 minutes. Plan dinner before 18:00 to arrive on time.

entertainment.name: Beijing Dance Academy (北京舞蹈学院) - Registration/Tour
entertainment.location: Haidian District, north of Zizhuyuan Park
entertainment.notes: Official academy accepting international students since 1955. Nearly 100 professional dance classrooms. Visit international student office for registration. Website: https://international.bda.edu.cn. This is for registration/tour, not a dance class. Actual class registration and fees TBD.

entertainment.name: Bridge Coffee (桥咖啡)
entertainment.notes: Popular with international students. Has rooftop open-air café. Near Wudaokou subway. Great for university neighborhood exploration.

entertainment.name: June Garden Coffee (六月花园咖啡馆)
entertainment.location: Wudaokou Longhu Tangning One ground floor
entertainment.notes: 11-year establishment. Underground space in 'Secret Garden' fairy tale style. Over 30 varieties of specialty hand-brewed coffee. Professional bar area. Cozy atmosphere perfect for evening after girlfriend's class.

entertainment.name: Metalhands Coffee
entertainment.notes: Beautiful spaces and quality coffee. Quiet, orderly atmosphere. Good for post-class relaxation.

entertainment.name: Indoor Couple Photography Session
entertainment.location: TBD - requires booking with specific studio
entertainment.notes: BOOKING REQUIRED: Options include Wave Soda (WAVESODA摄影工作室) at Jingyuan Art Centre (~2,388 RMB for 2 costumes, 2 sets, 12 photos) or Himo Studio (海马体照相馆, 600 locations nationwide). Book 2-3 weeks in advance. Session duration: 2-3 hours. Scheduled on Friday to avoid Tue/Wed/Thu class days.

entertainment.name: TOP TOY (Wangfujing apm)
entertainment.location: 2nd floor, Beijing apm, No. 138 Wangfujing Street, Dongcheng District
entertainment.notes: Over 1000 art toys, 9 categories including Blind Boxes, Garage Kits, Gundam Models, Lego. Popularizes designer toys. Budget for purchases.

entertainment.name: FAO Schwarz or Hamleys
entertainment.location: FAO: Guomao CBD (2,600 sqm) | Hamleys: Wangfujing (3 floors)
entertainment.notes: Upscale international toy retailers. FAO is Asia's first flagship. Hamleys is one of largest single-building toy stores. Budget for cute toys and souvenirs.

entertainment.name: Page One Bookstore
entertainment.location: 7th Floor Wangfujing Bookstore, 218 Wangfujing Dajie, OR 77 Meishuguan Houjie, Dongcheng
entertainment.notes: International chain with wide range of English books. Fiction, non-fiction, bestsellers, classics. Budget for book purchases.

entertainment.name: Foreign Languages Bookstore
entertainment.notes: Iconic destination for international readers. Extensive collection of foreign-language books, particularly English.

entertainment.name: Sanlian Taofen Bookstore
entertainment.notes: Second floor has large range of English-language editions and small cafe. Good for browsing and relaxing.

entertainment.name: University Area Coffee Crawl
entertainment.notes: Evening exploration of niche coffee shops after girlfriend's class. Visit 2-3 shops discovered earlier in trip.

entertainment.name: Final Shopping Day - Cute Toys and Souvenirs
entertainment.notes: Last chance for cute toy purchases and memorable souvenirs. Visit favorite spots from earlier days. Budget for final purchases.

notes: CRITICAL BOOKINGS REQUIRED: 1) Dance drama '只此青绿' tickets for Feb 22 (verify 2026 schedule, book 1-2 months advance via National Centre website/WeChat/hotline 66550000). 2) Indoor couple photography for Feb 27 (book Wave Soda or Himo Studio 2-3 weeks advance). 3) Day 1 Chongqing spa (book Mu Qian or KOH Thai in advance for evening slot). VERIFICATION NEEDED: Some coffee shop addresses require confirmation via Gaode Maps or Dianping. TOP TOY, Garden Books, and dance academy locations are confirmed. Budget estimates are per person unless noted. RedNote verification was limited due to technical constraints - recommend cross-checking venue reviews on Dianping/Xiaohongshu closer to travel dates for current status and real user experiences.
